dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3187837H] Stolen Content
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Thursday, February 22, 2007 12:50 PM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3187837H] Stolen Content ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Stolen Content Added by system at Thursday, Feb 22 2007 12:50 pm X-MailFrom: admin@galganov.ca X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Thu Feb 22 12:50:52 2007 Received: (qmail 22484 invoked by alias); 22 Feb 2007 18:50:52 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 22481 invoked from network); 22 Feb 2007 18:50:52 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 22 Feb 2007 18:50:52 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Thu, 22 Feb 2007 12:50:51 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Thu, 22 Feb 2007 12:50:52 -0600 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from admin@galganov.ca) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HKJ1n-0003iu-Ca for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 22 Feb 2007 12:50:51 -0600 Received: from smtp103.rog.mail.re2.yahoo.com ([206.190.36.81]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from admin@galganov.ca) with smtp (Exim) id 1HKJ1k-0000bj-6P for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 22 Feb 2007 12:50:48 -0600 Received: (qmail 71358 invoked from network); 22 Feb 2007 18:50:45 -0000 Received: from unknown (HELO ADMIN) (galganov@rogers.com@74.114.33.133 with login) by smtp103.rog.mail.re2.yahoo.com with SMTP; 22 Feb 2007 18:50:44 -0000 X-YMail-OSG: fUWOndcVM1nsF77ATgDRlzJpvUk3Xmk_OgeoQ6.j_w9meOSKEsf.o0G3mj_ODuIBnA-- From: "Galganov & Associates" To: Subject: Stolen Content Date: Thu, 22 Feb 2007 13:51:00 -0500 Message-ID: MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0002_01C75688.7C65B610" X-Priority: 1 (Highest) X-MSMail-Priority: High X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook IMO, Build 9.0.2416 (9.0.2910.0) X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2800.1896 Importance: High X-OriginalArrivalTime: 22 Feb 2007 18:50:52.0013 (UTC) FILETIME=[601E89D0:01C756B2] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Hello, It seems you are hosting FLASH-SCREEN.COM (traceroute to FLASH-SCREEN.COM [70.84.132.170]). We have been unable to find contact information for them but... We have found our content (stolen) reposted on their site: http://www.flash-screen.com/free-wallpaper/free,wallpapers,2072.html http://wallpapers.animalsearch.net/detail.html?640-dog29 http://www.flash-screen.com/free-wallpaper/free,wallpapers,2073.html http://wallpapers.animalsearch.net/detail.html?640-dog30 http://www.flash-screen.com/free-wallpaper/free,wallpapers,2074.html http://wallpapers.animalsearch.net/detail.html?640-dog20 http://www.flash-screen.com/free-wallpaper/free,wallpapers,2075.html http://wallpapers.animalsearch.net/detail.html?640-dog15 http://www.flash-screen.com/free-wallpaper/free,wallpapers,2076.html http://wallpapers.animalsearch.net/detail.html?640-dog13 http://www.flash-screen.com/free-wallpaper/free,wallpapers,2077.html http://wallpapers.animalsearch.net/detail.html?640-dog12 http://www.flash-screen.com/free-wallpaper/free,wallpapers,2078.html http://wallpapers.animalsearch.net/detail.html?640-dog16 http://www.flash-screen.com/free-wallpaper/free,wallpapers,2079.html http://wallpapers.animalsearch.net/detail.html?640-dog2 http://www.flash-screen.com/free-wallpaper/free,wallpapers,2080.html http://wallpapers.animalsearch.net/detail.html?640-dog5 We would appreciate if you could assist in removing our content or closing the site or that section of the site - as you see fit to help us negate the need to take additional actions. Thank you for your cooperation. ~~ Galganov & Associates KIS.BIZ(r) DomainsMatter.com!
